types.html:
marquer d'une pierre blanche

  1. (transitive, figuratively) to remember as a red letter day, to mark as a milestone, to see as a landmark event
    un jour à marquer d'une pierre blanche ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
trans: to remember as a red letter day, to mark as a milestone, to see as a landmark event
to remember as a red letter day, to mark as a milestone, to see as a landmark event

title: marquer d'une pierre blanche
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /maʁ.ke d‿yn pjɛʁ blɑ̃ʃ/
